title: Respond or I will write to President, Punjab Governor Banwarilal Purohit warns CM Bhagwant Mann
selftext: In his fresh letter to Punjab CM Bhagwant Mann, Governor Banwarilal Purohit said he had reason to believe that ‘there is failure of the constitutional machinery in the state’.
